snippet: With the opening of baseball museums at several stadiums in the past decade or so, many teams have employees who work as historians and curators.
abstract: Baseball museums at stadiums across the country provide opportunity for fans to connect with their team's past; several teams have employees who work as historians and curators, who cover the selection of artifacts and photographs for display.
lead_paragraph: With the opening of baseball museums at several stadiums in the past decade or so, many teams have employees who work as historians and curators.

headline.seo: Baseball Team Historians Are Fans’ Link to Past
headline.main: Team M.V.P. (Most Valuable Preserver): Historians Are Fans’ Link to Past
headline.print_headline: Team M.V.P. (Most Valuable Preserver): Historians Are Fans’ Link to Past
